name: Gladiator Gore
description: You are in a hopeless situation of gladiatorial combat against ancient warriors. With a handful of weapons to defend against the onslaught, you must kill the approaching enemies to claim stronger weapons and versatile power ups. Taking different potions from the killed enemies allows your fighter a better chance  of winning against the wave of gladiators. Slay basic skeletons, brutes, and berserkers, and with each round and each victory, your enemies will become increasingly more difficult, but reward you more!
